fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Resurrect (Night): Use the ability of a dead player - you are not limited by faction.
Harden Corpse (Night): Make a corpse usable again, or make it usable twice if you haven't used it. 2 uses, usable at the same time as Resurrect.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: Unlike normal ToS, you do not interfere with other roles that raise the undead. Also, corpses are only usable once.
